front.title: Allocation Token Extension for the Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP)

abstract.t: This document describes an Extensible Provisioning Protocol (EPP) extension for including an allocation token or for allocating an object like a domain name to the client. The allocation token MAY be transferred out-of-band to a client to give them authorization to allocate an object using one of the EPP transform commands including create, update, and transfer.
